meanings.sent1: The antiabortionist protested outside the clinic.
meanings.sent2: She knew her friend was an antiabortionist.
meanings.sent3: The antiabortionist joked that even the storks deliver babies safely.
meanings.sent4: His strong beliefs made him an antiabortionist warrior.
meanings.sent5: The image of the antiabortionist holding a sign was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Someone who is against the practice of abortion.
meanings.sent1: As an antiabortionist, she voiced her opinions at the rally.
meanings.sent2: The antiabortionist's views were well-known in the community.
meanings.sent3: The antiabortionist teased that even the tooth fairy wouldn't support abortion.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to the cause made her a true antiabortionist.
meanings.sent5: The antiabortionist's passion was evident in every conversation.
